definition: certificate/proof/to prove/to demonstrate/to confirm/variant of 症[zheng4]
Ming Dynasty (1368-1644)/surname Ming/Ming (c. 2000 BC), fourth of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
bright/opposite: dark 暗[an4]/(of meaning) clear/to understand/next/public or open/wise/generic term for a sacrifice to the gods
abbr. for 書經|书经[Shu1 jing1]

sentences.english: Candidates may be required to produce medical proof of their disability.
sentences.chinese: 申请人或须提交医生证明书，以证明他为残疾人士。

sentences.english: Our certificates are made valid with the official seal.
sentences.chinese: 我们的证明书以盖公章有效。

sentences.english: They only sign the death certificate and phone the mortuary.
sentences.chinese: 他们会签署死亡证明书，然后通知停尸间。

sentences.english: Quality certificates shall go along with the goods.
sentences.chinese: 质量证明书应随货同行。

sentences.english: This health certificate can be submitted after receiving the letter of acceptance from TUT.
sentences.chinese: 健康证明书亦可于接到本校之录取通知信函时寄缴。

sentences.english: I will not believe this until I see the Long Form Death Certificate.
sentences.chinese: 不看到死亡证明书的完全版我是不会相信的。

sentences.english: Does not contain the preservative Benzalkonium CI.
sentences.chinese: 不含防腐剂苯的身份证明书。

sentences.english: The appeal was adjourned for affidavits to be obtained.
sentences.chinese: 为获得宣誓证明书，上诉被推迟。

sentences.english: The closing date of study printed on the document of proof will be the date that the penalty is imposed.
sentences.chinese: 修业证明书所载修业截止日期以原处分日期为准。
附属喉管压力试验证明书。

sentences.english: A filed copy of this certificate has been forwarded to the new castle county recorder of deeds.
sentences.chinese: 此证明书的存档件已转发给纽卡斯尔县契约记录员。

sentences.english: Please attach this certificate to the instrument as evidence of stamping.
sentences.chinese: 请将此证明书夹附于文书上，作为已加盖印花的证明。

sentences.english: You’ll issue a certificate of quantity and weight.
sentences.chinese: 你们必须出具数量和重量证明书。

sentences.english: Our Certificate of Quality is made valid by means of the official seal。
sentences.chinese: 我们的质量证明书盖公章方为有效。

sentences.english: Our certificate is valid by means of official seal and personal chop of the commissioner.
sentences.chinese: 我们的证明书以盖公章和局长签字为有效。

sentences.english: The required certificates must apply to a single animal.
sentences.chinese: 每头动物均须个别证明书。
